codeChanges.textureSampling: Removed extra horizontal mirror pass in full-map wall texture sampling.
codeChanges.hudOverlay: Added modern HUD panel overlay loading/render path in app runtime view.
codeChanges.regressionTest: Added runtime renderer orientation test for column-major VSWAP sampling.
